results.name: a(n) = product of n and all its digits.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
formula: If n=abcd (say) in decimal, then a(n) = abcd * a * b * c * d.
maple: with transforms; [seq(n*digprod(n), n=0..200)]; # _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 12 2013
results.author: _Alexandre Wajnberg_, Sep 30 2004
